metadata.title: Tap2Eat - Intelligent Ordering System
metadata.description: Smart NFC and QR code ordering solutions for restaurants

about.title: About Tap2Eat
about.description: Tap2Eat provides comprehensive mobile NFC/QR ordering systems for restaurants. Our platform includes dine-in ordering (tap-to-order NFC/QR scan), takeout ordering, complete website setup with menu pages and promotional displays, merchant promotion platforms (FoodieGuide/ShopDineGuide), and smart business cards.
about.mission: We deliver promotional materials (posters, table stickers, NFC table cards, business cards), technical maintenance, and backend management services to help restaurants modernize their operations and enhance customer experience.

services.title: Our Services
services.deploymentDesc: Tap-to-order with NFC technology and QR code scanning for seamless table service
services.menuDesignDesc: Complete ordering website with digital menus, pricing, and promotional showcase pages
services.nfcCardsDesc: Featured on FoodieGuide, ShopDineGuide, and smart digital business cards
services.trainingDesc: Custom posters, table stickers, NFC table cards, business cards, and technical support
services.campaignsDesc: Easy-to-use dashboard for menu updates, order management, and business analytics
